summary:
[Updated]
+25 New unique followers based on Skyrim's most loved Khajiit, ranging from Warriors to Mages to Thieves.
descriptionHtml:
[size=3][font=Times New Roman][color=#f1c232][i][b][size=6]"May your road lead you to warm sands..."[/size][/b][/i][/color][size=4]
[/size][/font][size=5]
[/size][color=#93c47d][size=4]I'm going to start work on a new quest mod soon and so I'll probably never add any more followers to this file, but t[size=3][size=4]hanks for all the views, downloads and support on my first ever post! [/size][/size] [/size][/color][color=#900000]
[size=5] [/size][/color]
+25 New unique followers based on Skyrim's most loved Khajiit, ranging from Warriors to Mages to Thieves.
[i][b]
[size=5] [color=#cccccc]Features:[/color][/size][/b][/i]
[/size][list][*][size=3]10 New Followers, each with different skills and preferences.[/size][/*]
[*][size=3]Unique book explaining the location of each M'aiq in detail.[/size][/*]
[*][size=3]Fully voice acted using Skyrim's existing dialogue.[/size]
[/*]
[*][size=3]Still in beta so much more to come, including bonus followers for both [b]Dawnguard[/b] and [b]Dragonborn[/b]!
[/size][/*]
[*][size=3]Full compatibility ([i]as far as I know[/i]) with UFO, AFT and any other follower tweaking mod.
[/size][/*]
[/list][color=#b6b6b6][i][b][size=5]M'aiq The:[/size][/b][/i][/color][list][*][size=3]Adventurer[/size][/*]
[*][size=3]Greybeard[/size][/*]
[*][size=3]Pirate
[/size][/*]
[*][size=3]Dragonslayer[/size][/*]
[*][size=3]Stormcloak[/size][/*]
[*][size=3]Imperial[/size][/*]
[*][size=3]Thief[/size][/*]
[*][size=3]Assassin[/size][/*]
[*][size=3]Mage[/size][/*]
[*][size=3]Companion
[/size][/*]
[*][size=3]Forsworn[/size][/*]
[*][size=3]Necromancer[/size][/*]
[*][size=3]Brawler[/size][/*]
[*][size=3]Ancient[/size][/*]
[*][size=3]Hunter[/size][/*]
[*][size=3]Psijic[/size][/*]
[*][size=3]Guard (In each Hold capital)
[/size][/*]
[/list][color=#b6b6b6][size=3]
[/size][/color][size=4][i][color=#b6b6b6][size=3]*Note: Currently, all followers, when the option 'It's time for us to part ways' is selected, will remain in their current position. They will not return to the positions noted in the book! So remember where you left M'aiq![/size][/color][b]
[/b][/i][/size][size=3][i][b]
[/b][/i]
[/size]
author: Cosmic

files.name: M'aiqs of Skyrim - A Follower Mod OLD
files.fileName: M'aiqs of Skyrim - A Follower Mod-57410-0-5.zip
files.changelogHtml:
+Starting 10 M'aiq Followers
+Book explaining the location of each follower

files.changelogHtml:

*Tweaks on some existing followers
